Package fr.uge.patchwork2

Class Displays

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.patchwork2.Displays
public class Displays extends Object
Class used for creating strings to display the states of the game
Author:
Gabriel Radoniaina / Hervé Nguyen

    Generates a string that compromises of the informations necessary at the start of a turn It compromises of : - The state of the timeboard - The number of buttons currently held by the player - The list of available patches to buy - The state of his quiltboard

    • displayStartOfTurn

      public static String displayStartOfTurn(TimeBoard timeboard, PatchCircle patchcircle, Player currentPlayer, Player player1, Player player2, boolean tokenOneOnTwo)
      Generates a string that compromises of the informations necessary at the start of a turn It compromises of : - The state of the timeboard - The number of buttons currently held by the player - The list of available patches to buy - The state of his quiltboard
      Parameters:
      timeboard - timeboard
      patchcircle - patchcircle
      currentPlayer - the current player
      player1 - player one
      player2 - player two
      tokenOneOnTwo - boolean that states if when player one and two are at the same index, who is on top.
      Returns:
      the corresponding string

    • displayGrid

      public static String displayGrid(boolean[][] board, int size_x, int size_y)
      Auxiliary method to generate a string that represents either a patch or a quilt board Example for a 2x2 partially covered grid : ╔══╦══╗ ║**║**║ ╠══╬══╣ ║ ║ ║ ╚══╩══╝
      Parameters:
      board - array of boolean that represents occupied positions
      size_x - horizotal size of the array
      size_y - vertical size of the array
      Returns:
      the corresponding string

      the string that represents the state of quilt board

    • displayTimeToken

      public static String displayTimeToken(Player one, Player two, boolean tokenOneOnTwo)
      Generate a string that represents the current positions of the two player's time tokens
      Parameters:
      one - player one
      two - player two
      tokenOneOnTwo - boolean used to check if the token of player one is on the token of player two during a position conflict
      Returns:
      the corresponding string

    • displayTimeBoardState

      public static String displayTimeBoardState(TimeBoard timeBoard, Player one, Player two, boolean tokenOneOnTwo)
      Generate a string the state of the time board and the time tokens of the players
      Parameters:
      timeBoard - the time board
      one - player one
      two - layer two
      tokenOneOnTwo - boolean used to check if the token of player one is on the token of player two during a position conflict
      Returns:
      the corresponding string
